short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an address bar icon that shortens and shrinks Amazon links, adds your affiliate code, and copies it to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button that shortens and shrinks Amazon links, adds your affiliate code, and copies it to your clipboard.
